thread.title: Nice hotel and location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel and location - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Petteri K
title: Nice hotel and location
text: Really nice hotel. We arrived early and they kindly took our bags for storage until our room was ready, We had too big beds for me and my son. The room was really clean tidy, We had our own kitchen and big closets. Location was also really central and we walked around the city every day. We stayed for 5 nights and next time we come to New York this is our choice again.
